name: Rambla South/City/SQ Executive King Studio
description: Hey, big spender, we like your style. Soak in the best of easy living in our spacious Executive King Studio. With ample layouts, a private city-view balcony, vinyl timber flooring, and plush carpet in the bedroom, this superior accommodation in Woolloongabba will treat you right.

name: Rambla South/City/SQ Accessible King Studio
description: Looking for accessible Woolloongabba apartments? Designed with your comfort and ease front of mind, our Accessible King Studio is made just for you. Enjoy functional layouts and carefully considered furnishings. Breeze into the accessible private bathroom and make yourself at home in the well-equipped kitchen.
